channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: U.S., Iran to hold nuclear program talks. And, Dems unveil new list of DHS demands
item.description: The U.S. and Iran begin high-stakes talks today over Iran's nuclear program. And, Democrats unveil a detailed list of demands to change how DHS immigration enforcement officers operate.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. and Iran begin high-stakes talks today over Iran's nuclear program. And, Democrats unveil a detailed list of demands to change how DHS immigration enforcement officers operate.

(Image credit: AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Court records: Chicago immigration raid was about squatters, not Venezuelan gangs
item.description: In the documents the Department of Homeland Security said the raid "was based on intelligence that there were illegal aliens unlawfully occupying apartments in the building." There is no mention of criminal gangs or Tren de Aragua.
item.content:encoded:
In the documents the Department of Homeland Security said the raid "was based on intelligence that there were illegal aliens unlawfully occupying apartments in the building." There is no mention of criminal gangs or Tren de Aragua.

(Image credit: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: What does the CIA not want you to know? The quiz has the secret
item.description: Plus: ambiguous mascots, rodents with hard-to-spell names, and three boring photos of buildings.
item.content:encoded: Plus: ambiguous mascots, rodents with hard-to-spell names, and three boring photos of buildings.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Dog sled, ski ballet and other sports you could once see at the Winter Olympics
item.description: For many decades, Olympic Games included "demonstration sports." Some, like curling, became part of the permanent roster. But others, like skijoring, didn't stick around.
item.content:encoded:
For many decades, Olympic Games included "demonstration sports." Some, like curling, became part of the permanent roster. But others, like skijoring, didn't stick around.

(Image credit: Chris Cole)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Minneapolis now has daily deportation flights. One man has been documenting them
item.description: A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends immigration detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.
item.content:encoded:
A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends immigration detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.

(Image credit: Jaida Grey Eagle for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: U.S. and Iran to hold talks about Iran's nuclear program, Congress continues debate on immigration enforcement changes as funding deadline looms, FBI examines ransom notes in search for Nancy Guthrie.
item.content:encoded: U.S. and Iran to hold talks about Iran's nuclear program, Congress continues debate on immigration enforcement changes as funding deadline looms, FBI examines ransom notes in search for Nancy Guthrie.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: 'It's a thrill': These two friends have attended every Super Bowl
item.description: Don Crisman and Gregory Eaton have never missed a Super Bowl. On Sunday, they'll attend their 60th game.
item.content:encoded: Don Crisman and Gregory Eaton have never missed a Super Bowl. On Sunday, they'll attend their 60th game.
item.dc:creator: Halle Hewitt

item.title: Olympic figure skating starts with the team event. Here's what to know about it
item.description: The three-day event is a chance for the top 10 skating countries to bring home a medal — and for viewers to get acquainted with the sport's different disciplines and biggest names.
item.content:encoded:
The three-day event is a chance for the top 10 skating countries to bring home a medal — and for viewers to get acquainted with the sport's different disciplines and biggest names.

(Image credit: Matthew Stockman)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Ronald Hicks to be installed as 11th archbishop of New York
item.description: Ronald Hicks, a former Illinois bishop chosen by Pope Leo XIV to replace the retiring Cardinal Timothy Dolan, is set to be installed as New York's 11th archbishop
item.content:encoded:
Ronald Hicks, a former Illinois bishop chosen by Pope Leo XIV to replace the retiring Cardinal Timothy Dolan, is set to be installed as New York's 11th archbishop

(Image credit: Seth Wenig)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Iran and US set for talks in Oman over nuclear program after Tehran shaken by nationwide protests
item.description: Iran and the United States could hold negotiations in Oman after a chaotic week that initially saw plans for regional countries to participate in talks held in Turkey
item.content:encoded:
Iran and the United States could hold negotiations in Oman after a chaotic week that initially saw plans for regional countries to participate in talks held in Turkey

(Image credit: Mark Schiefelbein)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
